short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate content templates from tweets using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leaf is a Chrome extension to generate Twitter Content Templates.

🔥 Use Claude AI to turn successful tweets into customizable content templates in seconds 🔥

👉 Generate Templates:
- Leaf helps you create content templates from successful tweets using Claude AI
- No more starting from scratch or spending hours brainstorming tweet ideas
- Quickly generate templates for different content types

👉 Easy-to-Use:
- Copy generated templates to your clipboard with a single click
- Seamlessly integrate templates into your Twitter workflow

👉 Personalized AI Access:
- Add your own Anthropic API key
- Maintain control over your AI usage and costs

👉 Pay per Use:
- Use Leaf with your own Anthropic API key
- Your costs depend on your usage and will be charged directly by Anthropic

💻 How to get started:

◆ Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to your toolbar
◆ Add your Anthropic API key in the extension settings
◆ Navigate to Twitter/X and click the Leaf icon to start generating templates

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:

📌 How does Leaf generate templates?
Leaf uses Claude AI to analyze successful tweets and extract their structural elements to create customizable templates.

📌 Do I need to pay for Leaf?
You will need to provide your own Anthropic API key to start using Leaf, which you can obtain from Anthropic's website.

📌 How do I use the generated templates?
Once a template is generated, you can easily copy it to your clipboard and paste it directly into your tweet composer on Twitter/X.

📌 Is my API key secure?
Your Anthropic API key is stored locally on your device. Leaf does not have access to or store your key on any external servers.

💬 Contact us:
Questions or suggestions? Please contact us at products@moritzkremb.com

Try Leaf now and accelerate your Twitter content creation process!
